pkgmetadata.longdescription: Truncated Exponential Family // Handles truncated members from the exponential family of probability distributions. Contains functions such as rtruncnorm() and dtruncpois(), which are truncated versions of rnorm() and dpois() from the stats package that also offer richer output containing, for example, the distribution parameters. It also provides functions to retrieve the original distribution parameters from a truncated sample by maximum-likelihood estimation.
